title: Determining a Proportion Given Data
question_text:
Itâ€™s family game night in Cocoa Beach. Residents settle in to play their favorite game and eat their favorite snack.
A random sample of $115\text{ families}$ were asked their preferred game and snack, and the results are presented in the two-way table below.
What proportion of Wii bowlers prefer pizza bites?
tables:
Pizza BitesChips and DipCookies
Yahtzee10312
Trivial Pursuit8147
Monopoly14177
Wii Bowling1274
